content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I find the proposed apartment highly desirable due to its prime location and modern features. However, as I aim to maximize my profit, I must start with a higher-than-average price. How does 1250 Euro per month sound to you, Max? Remember, if you accept this price, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and replace [x] with the number. If not, consider giving a reason for your objection.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, although I understand the desirability of the apartment, I need to carefully consider my budget as a student. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price seems excessively high for my financial situation.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my aim is to obtain a premium rent, but it seems we have a significant gap in affordability expectations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
